dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5793 IH: Water Access Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Dingell (for herself, Ms. Tlaib, and Ms. Blunt Rochester) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Appropriations

form.official-title: To appropriate $500 million to the low-income household water assistance program under section 2912 of the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Water Access Act.

There is appropriated to the Secretary of Health and Human Services for fiscal year 2024, $500,000,000 for the low-income household water assistance program under section 2912 of subtitle K of the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 (15 U.S.C. 9058b).
